New Records: Anthony Edwards moved past Trae Young and D'Angelo Russell for the most career games with 6+ made threes by a player aged 23 or younger in NBA history.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards led the way with 37 points, eight assists, and seven rebounds.
Edwards made six threes in the win over LA.
The Minnesota Timberwolves erased a 19-point deficit to defeat the LA Clippers.
Kawhi Leonard struggled in his 20 minutes of action, finishing with eight points and converting on just three of his 11 field goal attempts.
Pre-Game Insights: Ty Lue told reporters pregame that Kawhi Leonard would not close the game no matter the score.
Post-Match Reflections: This was an impressive showing from Edwards, and more importantly a big win for Minnesota at home.
Sweeping their season series with the Clippers, the Timberwolves now have that tiebreaker should it come into play.
